properties.name: character_name
properties.instructions: The exact character name as the internal system knows it.

properties.name: attribute_name
properties.instructions: The exact attribute name you want to update. Must NOT exist in the current character attributes. This must NEVER be description.

properties.name: attribute_name
properties.instructions: The exact attribute name you want to update. Must exist in the current character attributes. This must NEVER be description.

properties.name: character_name
properties.instructions: The exact character name as the internal system knows it.

properties.name: instructions
properties.instructions: The instructions to the writer on how to change the attribute. If you want to replace the entire attribute this must include enough details to allow the writer to write a complete replacement. If you only want to change / add / remove aspects of the attribute then be specific of how the attribute needs to be changed. (When removing information, specify explicitly that you wish to keep other information)

properties.name: character_name
properties.instructions: The exact character name as the internal system knows it.

properties.name: replace
properties.instructions: Whether or not to completely replace the attribute. Pass `true` if you want to replace and completely rewrite the attribue. Pass `false` if you want to make changes to the existing value.

properties.name: character_name
properties.instructions: The exact character name as the internal system knows it.

properties.name: detail_name
properties.instructions: The exact detail name you want to update. Must exist in the current character details. This must NEVER be `description`.

properties.name: character_name
properties.instructions: The exact character name as the internal system knows it.

properties.name: detail_name
properties.instructions: The title or question of the detail you want to add. This also will serve as a unique identifier for the detail and must be human readable.

properties.name: instructions
properties.instructions: The instructions to the writer on what the attribute should contain. Be specific and concise.

properties.name: instructions
properties.instructions: The instructions to the writer on what information the new background detail should contain. Be specific and concise.

properties.template:
Analyze the task given to you and then call the appropriate function(s) to accomplish it.

Carefully decide the actions you need to take to fulfill the task completely. Consider the meaning of attributes, details and the character's main description.

YOU MUST ANSWER THESE QUESTIONS FIRST:

1. What existing attributes do i need to change, if any?
2. What existing details do i need to change, if any?
3. What new entries do i need add, if any?
4. Does the description need updating?

IF THERE IS NOTHING TO DO, DO NOT CALL ANY FUNCTIONS.

TASK: {instructions}

properties.content:
Attributes, details and description are different data points.

ATTRIBUTES are for brief, vital information about the character. They define the character's profile sheet.

DETAILS are for longer background details about the character. Their name can be a question or a sentence. Their main goal is to provide deeper information about the character.

ATTRIBUES and DETAILS may reference similar information and you may need to update both depending on what needs to be changed.

The DESCRIPTION refers to the character's main overall description. Its meant to be multi paragraph (but managable) piece of information that describes the character's main characteristics.

properties.instructions: Add a new detail to the character's backstory. This CANNOT be used to update the character description, it only facilitates additions to the character's individual background details.

examples.instructions: Create a detailed account of the traumatic incident that changed Detective Rivera's approach to police work. Include the case of a missing child that she failed to solve in time, the guilt she carries, and how it drives her current dedication to victim advocacy.
examples.detail_name: What case haunts Detective Rivera the most?

examples.instructions: Describe Lyra's secret sanctuary deep in the Elderwood Forest where she practices forbidden shadow magic. Include the hidden cave behind the waterfall, the ancient runes carved into the walls, and the magical creatures that guard the entrance.

properties.instructions: Removes an existing detail from the character's backstory.

Make changes to a character's overall description. If you want to replace the entire description you MUST provide enough details and context in your instructions so the writer can rewrite the whole description.

If you want to make changes to the existing description you MUST be specific in your instructions on what should be changed and how.

examples.instructions: Completely rewrite Dr. Elena Vasquez's description to reflect major changes after the incident. She should now be a 36-year-old former forensic psychologist who left her practice to become a private investigator. She has a visible scar across her left cheek from the attack, wears more casual clothing instead of professional attire, and has developed a more cynical worldview. Include her new skills in surveillance and her struggle with PTSD.

Add information to Lyra Moonwhisper's existing description about her recent magical transformation. Include that her silver hair now has streaks of deep purple that glow when she uses shadow magic, and her eyes occasionally flicker with dark energy. Keep all existing information about her elvish features, age, and general appearance.

properties.instructions: Removes an existing attribute from the character's attribute sheet.
Add a new existing attribute in the character's attributre sheet. This CANNOT be used to set the character description, it only facilitates additions to the character sheet.

examples.instructions: Describe the classified research Dr. Chen conducted for the military before joining the civilian medical team, including why she left that work behind and what she's trying to forget.

(When removing information, specify explicitly that you wish to keep other information)

properties.template:
Update character context `{context_type} - {context_name}`:
Context ID: `{context_id}`
``` diff
{diff_plain}
```

properties.instructions: Update an existing attribute in the character's attributre sheet. This CANNOT be used to update the character description, it only facilitates changes to the character sheet.

examples.instructions: Add magical healing abilities to her existing skill set. Include that she recently discovered these powers and is still learning to control them. Keep all her other established skills.

Completely rewrite her relationships to focus on her new romantic life. She is now in a committed relationship with Riley, whom she met at a medical conference. Include that this relationship has become her priority and she's distanced herself from most of her previous colleagues and friends to focus on this new chapter in her life.
